insert into anole_hub (Type, Address, CreateTime, UpdateTime, Status) values (#{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update anole_hub set Type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select Id, Type, Address, CreateTime, UpdateTime, Status from anole_hub
